t: Kramer by Zwilling – Burrfection Store
s: Bob Kramer is a renewed American bladesmith based in Bellingham, Washington. He is considered one of the greatest American knifemakers. Kramer by Zwilling knives are based on Kramer's knife profile, and made in Japan with high Japanese standards. Founded nearly three centuries ago in Germany, ...
